articles.title: Jussie survived on ICE WATER during his six days in jail - Daily Mail
articles.description: Disgraced actor Jussie Smollett consumed nothing but ice water during his six days in a Chicago jail, a lawyer claimed as the star was freed to begin his appeal.
articles.content:
